attributes.action: SAVE OUR FUTURES AND OUR ELDERLY PEOPLE OF SHEFFIELD
attributes.additional_details: STOP THE CLOSURES OF THE LAST 2 RESOURCE CENTRES, HAZELHURST AND SEVENFIELDS  IN SHEFFIELD AND LOOK AFTER OUR ELDERLY PEOPLE AND BRING BACK THE PROPER CARE WE ALL NEED , NOT CLOSURES AND JOB LOSSES, FROM THE UNITS AND IN THE COMMUNITY STAFF THAT ARE PROPOSED FOR MARCH 2012 THAT WILL LEAVE THE ELDERLY MORE VULNERABLE. LETS MAKE ENGLAND PROUD AGAIN ...............
